titleStmt.title: Consilium collegii medici Parisiensis de mania G. Eglishemii, quam prodidit scripto cui titulus, Duellum poëticum pro dignitate paraphraseos Psalmi CIIII decertantibus G. [brace] Eglishemio Medico, Buchanano Pædonomo [brace] regio, quod Parisiensis Academiæ iudicio submisit.
titleStmt.author: Johnstoun, Arthur, 1587-1641.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Johnstoun by STC (2nd ed.) and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Imperfect: cropped and tightly bound, with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
